title: Fort Sumter National Monument: Get Involved
body: Explore This Park    Get Involved           Get Involved         Ranger Kelsey and Volunteer Doug holding the folded U.S. Flag at Fort Sumter in December 2015. NPS/Flectcher  Looking for how to get involved? Browse through the website navigation or use the search tool to find opportunities.  NPS Centennial Partners Donate Volunteer Planning
